Frequently Asked Questions

Got questions? We've got answers. Here are the most common questions about working with Antimatter AI.

What services does Antimatter AI offer?

We offer comprehensive digital solutions including web design and development, mobile app development, digital marketing, AI solutions, Web3 and blockchain development, and cybersecurity services. Our team specializes in creating cutting-edge technology solutions tailored to your business needs.

How long does a typical project take?

Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. A standard website typically takes 4-8 weeks, while more complex applications or AI solutions can take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation and keep you updated throughout the development process.

Do you work with startups or only established companies?

We work with businesses of all sizes, from early-stage startups to Fortune 500 companies. Our scalable approach allows us to provide value whether you're launching your first product or expanding an existing enterprise solution.

What makes Antimatter AI different from other agencies?

Our unique combination of cutting-edge technology expertise, creative design thinking, and business strategy sets us apart. We don't just build products – we create digital experiences that drive real business results. Our team stays ahead of technology trends, particularly in AI and Web3.

Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?

Yes, we offer comprehensive post-launch support including maintenance, updates, hosting, and technical support. We believe in long-term partnerships and are committed to your continued success even after your project goes live.

How do you handle project communication and updates?

We maintain transparent communication throughout every project with regular check-ins, progress reports, and collaborative tools. You'll have direct access to your project team and receive weekly updates on milestones, challenges, and next steps.

What is your pricing structure?

Our pricing is project-based and depends on scope, complexity, and timeline. We provide detailed proposals with transparent pricing after our initial consultation. We also offer flexible payment schedules and can work within various budget ranges.

Can you help with AI integration for existing systems?

Absolutely! We specialize in AI integration and can help modernize your existing systems with machine learning, automation, and intelligent features. Our team assesses your current infrastructure and recommends the best AI solutions for your specific use case.

Still have questions?

We're here to help. Get in touch with our team for personalized answers.
